summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions related to Jeffrey Epstein's accounts for the month of February 2017. It includes information on deposits, outgoing transfers, and account balances, highlighting significant transactions involving large sums of money.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the account holder for the financial transactions detailed in the document.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Bank of America
events.description: A transfer of $1,000,000.00 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account to Bank of America.

events.title: Cash Transfer Credit
events.description: A cash transfer credit of $200,000.00 was recorded in Epstein's account.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Stream Aerospace Corporation
events.description: A transfer of $116,700.00 was made from Jeffrey Epstein's account to Stream Aerospace Corporation.

locations: 6100 Red 14ook Quarter, B3 St. Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The document details account balances and transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for February 2017.
The beginning balance on February 1, 2017, was $1,009,399.94.
A significant outgoing transfer of $1,000,000.00 was made to Bank of America on February 1, 2017.
A cash transfer credit of $200,000.00 was recorded on February 27, 2017.
An outgoing transfer of $116,700.00 was made to Stream Aerospace Corporation on February 27, 2017.
